 47. We note that the last value of the given data was 12.402 (on 2016-07-08 23:00:00) and our forecast for the same hour the next day (2016-07-09 23:00:00) is 10.417, which is a decrease. But our model has a daily increasing trend? However, note that the hourly profile for hour23 is 9.8345 and the factor for day5 is 1.0591, so 9.8345*1.0591=10.417. The previous day's hour23 was 12.402, which is above the average for that hour (which was 9.8345) so it was an outlier? Our model is based on averages and a linear trend of daily averages, so it smooths out.
